KeepPreviousBorrowerInterval.explanation: Number of days that must pass before the previous borrower is expunged from old issues if that item has not since been checked out.

KeepPreviousBorrower.explanation: Retain most recent borrower info for each item regardless of anonymization policy.

SplitStatistics.explanation: Anonymize statistics by splitting each entry into two, one for patron info and one for item info

ShowSupressStatus.explanation: Enable display of suppressed items in staff catalogue bib detail view

serialsadditems.explanation: Create item records for received serials

OPACAdvSearchInputCount.explanation: Number of search boxes to display

marcflavour.explanation: Define global MARC flavor (MARC21 or UNIMARC) used for character encoding

maxItemsinSearchResults.explanation: How many items to show in OPAC search results list?

AuthorisedValueImages.explanation: Use authorised values to define images (expensive)

StaffShowExpiredHolds.explanation: The number in days that expired holds will display in the staff hold history tab.  A value of 0 will display nothing.

HoldExpireLength.explanation: Specify how many days before a hold expires

DebugLevel.explanation: Define the level of debugging information sent to the browser when errors are encountered (set to 0 in production). 0=none, 1=some, 2=most

OAI-PMH:Set.explanation: OAI-PMH exported set, the set name is followed by a comma and a short description, one set by line

GetItAcquisitions.explanation: If set, a link to GetIt Acquisitions will appear in the Koha menu and GetIt Acquisitions-specific functionality will appear elsewhere. Please refer to the documentation for details.

CircFinesBreakdown.explanation: Show a breakdown of fines by type on the checkout page

AllowHoldPolicyOverride.explanation: Allow staff to override hold policies when placing holds

EnableHoldOnShelfNotice.explanation: If ON, allow hold awaiting pickup (holds shelf) notices to be sent.

PatronsPerPage.explanation: Number of Patrons Per Page displayed by default

opacmsgtab.explanation: If on,enables display of My Messaging tab in OPAC patron account and the email/text message settings in OPAC user update tab.

HoldButtonConfirm.explanation: Display Confirm button when hold triggered. Leave either this setting or HoldButtonPrintConfirm on.

TransfersMaxDaysWarning.explanation: Define the days before a transfer is suspected of having a problem

CheckoutTimeout.explanation: Value in seconds before a window pops up on the circ screen asking the librarian if they would like to continue using this record or to search for a new borrower.

opaclayoutstylesheet.explanation: Enter the name of the layout CSS stylesheet to use in the OPAC

OpacAuthorities.explanation: If ON, enables the search authorities link on OPAC

IntranetNav.explanation: Use HTML tabs to add navigational links to the left-hand navigational bar in the Staff Client

SyndeticsExcerpt.explanation: Display Excerpts and first chapters on OPAC from Syndetics

OPACSearchSuggestionsCount.explanation: If greater than 0, sets the number of search suggestions provided.

OpacBrowser.explanation: If ON, enables subject authorities browser on OPAC (needs to set misc/cronjob/sbuild_browser_and_cloud.pl)

ShowPatronSearchBySQL.explanation: If turned on,a search by sql box will appear on the Patrons search pages.

intranetreadinghistory.explanation: If ON, Reading History is enabled for all patrons

opaccolorstylesheet.explanation: Define an auxiliary stylesheet for OPAC use, to override specified settings from the primary opac.css stylesheet. Enter the filename (if the file is in the server's css directory) or a complete URL beginning with http (if the file lives on a remote server).

BibliosCataloging.explanation: If set, a link to Biblios Cataloging will appear in the Koha menu and Biblios Cataloging-specific functionality will appear elsewhere. Please refer to the documentation for details.

itembarcodelength.explanation: Number of characters in system-wide barcode schema (item barcodes).

LibraryName.explanation: Define the library name as displayed on the OPAC

ExtendedPatronAttributes.explanation: Use extended patron IDs and attributes

AllowNotForLoanOverride.explanation: If ON, Koha will allow the librarian to loan a not for loan item.

OPACAmazonEnabled.explanation: Turn ON Amazon Content in the OPAC - You MUST set AWSAccessKeyID, AWSPrivateKey, and AmazonAssocTag if enabled

borrowerRelationship.explanation: Define valid relationships between a guarantor & a guarantee (separated by | or ,)

OpacNav.explanation: Use HTML tags to add navigational links to the left-hand navigational bar in OPAC

OpacCloud.explanation: If ON, enables subject cloud on OPAC

intranet_includes.explanation: The includes directory you want for specific look of Koha (includes or includes_npl for example)

AllowDueDateInPast.explanation: Allows a due date to be set in the past for testing.

BiblioAddsAuthorities.explanation: If ON, adding a new biblio will check for an existing authority record and create one on the fly if one doesn't exist

OPACURLOpenInNewWindow.explanation: If ON, URLs in the OPAC open in a new window

SpecifyDueDate.explanation: Define whether to display "Specify Due Date" form in Circulation

SyndeticsReviews.explanation: Display Reviews on OPAC from Syndetics

BorrowerMandatoryField.explanation: Choose the mandatory fields for a patron's account

AmazonCoverImages.explanation: Display Cover Images in Staff Client from Amazon Web Services

AWSPrivateKey.explanation: See:  http://aws.amazon.com.  Note that this is required after 2009/08/15 in order to retrieve any enhanced content other than book covers from Amazon.

SMSSendDriver.explanation: Sets which SMS::Send driver is used to send SMS messages.

emailLibrarianWhenHoldIsPlaced.explanation: If ON, emails the librarian whenever a hold is placed

itemcallnumber.explanation: The MARC field/subfield that is used to calculate the itemcallnumber (Dewey would be 082ab or 092ab; LOC would be 050ab or 090ab) could be 852hi from an item record

DisplayClearScreenButton.explanation: If set to ON, a clear screen button will appear on the circulation page.

MarkLostItemsReturned.explanation: If ON,will check in items (removing them from a patron list of checked out items) when they are marked as lost

CircAutocompl.explanation: If ON, autocompletion is enabled for the Circulation input

UsePeriodicals.explanation: Use newer "periodicals" module to manage serials.

reservesNeedConfirmationOnCheckout.explanation: Pipe-delimited list of types of prompts upon checkout with a hold pending: one or more of 'patronNotReservist_holdPending','patronNotReservist_holdWaiting','otherBibItem','noPrompts'.

OPACShowExpiredHolds.explanation: The number in days that expired holds will display in the OPAC my hold history tab.  A value of 0 will display nothing.

OCLCAffiliateID.explanation: Use with FRBRizeEditions and XISBN. You can sign up for an AffiliateID here: http://www.worldcat.org/wcpa/do/AffiliateUserServices?method=initSelfRegister

LetterLog.explanation: If ON, log all notices sent

OPACFinesTab.explanation: If OFF the patron fines tab in the OPAC is disabled.

AmazonReviews.explanation: Display Amazon review on staff interface - You MUST set AWSAccessKeyID, AWSPrivateKey, and AmazonAssocTag if enabled

reviewson.explanation: If ON, enables patron reviews of bibliographic records in the OPAC

FilterBeforeOverdueReport.explanation: Do not run overdue report until filter selected

MaxShelfHoldsPerDay.explanation: Maximum number of on-shelf holds each patron can place per day.

singleBranchMode.explanation: Operate in Single-branch mode, hide branch selection in the OPAC

dontmerge.explanation: If ON, modifying an authority record will not update all associated bibliographic records immediately, ask your system administrator to enable the merge_authorities.pl cron job

EnableHoldExpiredNotice.explanation: If ON, allow hold expiration notices to be sent.

AllowMultipleHoldsPerBib.explanation: This allows multiple items per record to be placed on hold by a single patron. To enable,enter a list of space separated itemtype codes in the field (i.e. MAG JMAG YMAG). Useful for magazines,encyclopedias and other bibs where the attached items are not identical.

SyndeticsCoverImageSize.explanation: Choose the size of the Syndetics Cover Image to display on the OPAC detail page, MC is Medium, LC is Large

HoldsTransportationReductionThreshold.explanation: The number of holds that must be in the queue for the holds transportation reduction to be enabled ( assuming FillRequestsAtPickupLibrary is enabled ).

OPACPatronDetails.explanation: If OFF the patron details tab in the OPAC is disabled.

opaclanguages.explanation: Set the default language in the OPAC.

BorrowersLog.explanation: If ON, log edit/create/delete actions on patron data

ShowPatronImageInWebBasedSelfCheck.explanation: If ON, displays patron image when a patron uses web-based self-checkout

OPACUseHoldType.explanation: If ON, allow OPAC users to place hold on specific items that are designated as item-level hold records.  Used in conjuction with OPACItemHolds.

SyndeticsSeries.explanation: Display Series information on OPAC from Syndetics

OPACShowActiveBranchFirstInResults.explanation: If ON, in the OPAC, use the active library as the primary sort field for a record's holdings.  Used in conjunction with OPACDefaultItemSort where OPACDefaultItemSort is the secondary sort field.  Otherwise if Off, sort by OPACDefaultItemSort.

URLLinkText.explanation: Text to display as the link anchor in the OPAC

OPACSearchForTitleIn.explanation: Enter the HTML that will appear in the 'Search for this title in' box on the detail page in the OPAC.  Enter {TITLE}, {AUTHOR}, or {ISBN} in place of their respective variables in the URL. Leave blank to disable 'More Searches' menu.
OPACSearchForTitleIn.value:
• Other Libraries (WorldCat)
  • Other Databases (Google Scholar)
  • Online Stores (Bookfinder.com)

OPACItemHolds.explanation: Allow OPAC users to place hold on specific items. If OFF, users can only request next available copy.

FillRequestsAtPickupLibraryAge.explanation: Measured in days. If there are any higher-priority active holds that have been waiting longer than the FillRequestsAtPickupLibraryAge, then the item will fill the highest priority active hold, even thought that will require transportation. Note that the highest-priority hold may not be the one thatâ€™ s been waiting longest.

opaclanguagesdisplay.explanation: If ON, enables display of Change Language feature on OPAC

sortbynonfiling.explanation: Sort search results by MARC nonfiling characters (deprecated)

timeout.explanation: Inactivity timeout for cookies authentication (in seconds)

XISBN.explanation: Use with FRBRizeEditions. If ON, Koha will use the OCLC xISBN web service in the Editions tab on the detail pages. See: http://www.worldcat.org/affiliate/webservices/xisbn/app.jsp

soundon.explanation: Enable to turn on circulation sounds. Not available on all browsers.

insecure.explanation: If ON, bypasses all authentication. Be careful!

IntranetBiblioDefaultView.explanation: Choose the default detail view in the staff interface; choose between normal, labeled_marc, marc or isbd

checkdigit.explanation: If ON, enable checks on patron cardnumber: none or "Katipo" style checks

MIME.explanation: Define the default application for exporting report data

patronbarcodelength.explanation: Number of characters in system-wide barcode schema (patron cardnumbers).

OPACShowCompletedHolds.explanation: The number in days that filled holds will display in the OPAC my hold history tab.  A value of 0 will display nothing.

UsePatronBranchForPatronInfo.explanation: If ON, the SIP patron information response (64) will use the patron branch rather than the institution ID in the AO field

patronimages.explanation: Enable patron images for the Staff Client

opacstylesheet.explanation: Enter a complete URL to use an alternate layout stylesheet in OPAC

TagsShowOnDetail.explanation: Number of tags to display on detail page.  0 is off.

StaffSerialIssueDisplayCount.explanation: Number of serial issues to display per subscription in the Staff client

OPACAllowHoldDateInFuture.explanation: If set, along with the AllowHoldDateInFuture system preference, OPAC users can set the date of a hold to be in the future.

RefundLostReturnedAmount.explanation: Refund a returned lost item rather than applying it to an outstanding balance

AllowOverrideLogin.explanation: If ON,Koha will allow staff members to temporarily log in as a user with more rights in certain situations

LabelMARCView.explanation: Define how a MARC record will display

BranchTransferLimitsType.explanation: When using branch transfer limits, choose whether to limit by itemtype or collection code.

XISBNDailyLimit.explanation: The xISBN Web service is free for non-commercial use when usage does not exceed 500 requests per day

RenewalPeriodBase.explanation: Set whether the renewal date should be counted from the date_due or from the moment the Patron asks for renewal

OPACAmazonReviews.explanation: Display Amazon readers reviews on OPAC

BakerTaylorPassword.explanation: Baker & Taylor Password for Content Cafe (external content)

BatchItemEditor.explanation: Choose the preferred bulk item editor.

yuipath.explanation: Insert the path to YUI libraries, choose local if you use koha offline

barcodeValidationRoutine.explanation: The type of barcode and routine against which barcodes will be checked for well-formed syntax.  Leave blank to allow any barcode string.

InProcessingToShelvingCart.explanation: If set, when any item with a location code of PROC is 'checked in', it's location code will be changed to CART.

StaffSearchSuggestionsCount.explanation: If greater than 0, sets the number of search suggestions provided.

memberofinstitution.explanation: If ON, patrons can be linked to institutions

canreservefromotherbranches.explanation: With Independent branches on, can a user from one library place a hold on an item from another library

ceilingDueDate.explanation: If set, date due will not be past this date.  Enter date according to the dateformat System Preference

OPACShelfBrowser.explanation: Enable/disable Shelf Browser on item details page. WARNING: this feature is very resource consuming on collections with large numbers of items.

SyndeticsAwards.explanation: Display Awards on OPAC from Syndetics

OPACViewOthersSuggestions.explanation: If ON, allows all suggestions to be displayed in the OPAC

OPACBaseURL.explanation: Specify the Base URL of the OPAC, e.g., opac.mylibrary.com, the http:// will be added automatically by Koha.

NotifyBorrowerDeparture.explanation: Define number of days before expiry where circulation is warned about patron account expiry

HoldButtonPrintConfirm.explanation: Display Confirm and Print Slip button when hold triggered. Leave either this setting or HoldButtonConfirm on.

OPACSerialIssueDisplayCount.explanation: Number of serial issues to display per subscription in the OPAC

opacheader.explanation: Add HTML to be included as a custom header in the OPAC

opacbookbag.explanation: If ON, enables display of Cart feature

hide_marc.explanation: If ON, disables display of MARC fields, subfield codes & indicators (still shows data)

AutoSelfCheckAllowed.explanation: For corporate and special libraries which want web-based self-check available from any PC without the need for a manual staff login. Most libraries will want to leave this turned off. If on,requires self-check ID and password to be entered in AutoSelfCheckID and AutoSelfCheckPass sysprefs.

OPACUserCSS.explanation: Add CSS to be included in the OPAC in an embedded <style> tag.

EnableHoldCancelledNotice.explanation: If ON, allow hold cancellation notices to be sent.

PINESISBN.explanation: Use with FRBRizeEditions. If ON, Koha will use PINES OISBN web service in the Editions tab on the detail pages.

dateformat.explanation: Define global date format (us mm/dd/yyyy, metric dd/mm/yyy, ISO yyyy/mm/dd)

OpacHighlightedWords.explanation: If Set, then queried words are higlighted in OPAC

OPACAmazonSimilarItems.explanation: Turn ON Amazon Similar Items feature  - You MUST set AWSAccessKeyID, AWSPrivateKey, and AmazonAssocTag if enabled

numSearchResults.explanation: Specify the maximum number of results to display on a page of results

DisplayInitials.explanation: Ability to turn the initials field on/off in patron screen

AutoSelfCheckPass.explanation: Password to be used for automatic web-based self-check. Only applies if AutoSelfCheckAllowed syspref is turned on.

NewPatronReadingHistory.explanation: Set a default value regarding the retention of the reading history for a new patron

EnableClubsAndServices.explanation: Turn on the Clubs and Services module

expandedSearchOption.explanation: If ON, set advanced search to be expanded by default

NextLibraryHoldsQueueWeight.explanation: Specify a list of library location codes separated by commas -- the list of codes will be traversed and weighted with first values given higher weight for holds fulfillment -- alternatively, if RandomizeHoldsQueueWeight is set, the list will be used in order. This preference overrides both StaticHoldsQueueWeight and RandomizeHoldsQueueWeight.

KohaAdminEmailAddress.explanation: Define the email address where patron modification requests are sent

FRBRizeEditions.explanation: If ON, Koha will query one or more ISBN web services for associated ISBNs and display an Editions tab on the details pages

TalkingTechMessagePath.explanation: Set the file system path for the Talking Tech MESSAGE file

DisplayStafficonsXSLT.explanation: If ON, displays the format, audience, type icons in the staff XSLT MARC21 result and display pages.

TagsInputOnList.explanation: Allow users to input tags from the search results list.

opacbookbagName.explanation: Allows libraries to define a different name for the OPAC Cart feature,such as Bookbag or Personal Shelf. If no name is defined,it will default to Cart.

AutomaticItemReturn.explanation: If ON, Koha will automatically set up a transfer of this item to its homebranch

AutoEmailPrimaryAddress.explanation: Defines the default email address where 'Account Details' emails are sent.

HomeOrHoldingBranch.explanation: Used by Circulation to determine which branch of an item to check with independent branches on, and by search to determine which branch to choose for availability

opaccredits.explanation: Define HTML Credits at the bottom of the OPAC page

z3950NormalizeAuthor.explanation: If ON, Personal Name Authorities will replace authors in biblio.author

SpineLabelAutoPrint.explanation: If this setting is turned on, a print dialog will automatically pop up for the quick spine label printer.

OPACnumSearchResults.explanation: Specify the maximum number of results to display on a page of results

opacthemes.explanation: Define the current theme for the OPAC interface.

AllowHoldsOnDamagedItems.explanation: Allow hold requests to be placed on damaged items

AmazonSimilarItems.explanation: Turn ON Amazon Similar Items feature  - You MUST set AWSAccessKeyID, AWSPrivateKey, and AmazonAssocTag if enabled

XSLTResultsDisplay.explanation: Enable XSL stylesheet control over results page display on OPAC WARNING: MARC21 Only

SessionStorage.explanation: Use database or a temporary file for storing session data

hidelostitems.explanation: If ON, disables display of"lost" items in OPAC.

AddPatronLists.explanation: Allow user to choose what list to pick up from when adding patrons

AmazonEnabled.explanation: Turn ON Amazon Content - You MUST set AWSAccessKeyID, AWSPrivateKey, and AmazonAssocTag if enabled

OAI-PMH:MaxCount.explanation: OAI-PMH maximum number of records by answer to ListRecords and ListIdentifiers queries

OPACDisplayExtendedSubInfo.explanation: If ON, extended subscription information is displayed in the OPAC

UseBranchTransferLimits.explanation: If ON, Koha will will use the rules defined in branch_transfer_limits to decide if an item transfer should be allowed.

gist.explanation: Default Goods and Services tax rate NOT in %, but in numeric form (0.12 for 12%), set to 0 to disable GST

StaffShowCompletedHolds.explanation: The number in days that filled holds will display in the staff hold history tab.  A value of 0 will display nothing.

OpacTopissue.explanation: If ON, enables the 'most popular items' link on OPAC. Warning, this is an EXPERIMENTAL feature, turning ON may overload your server

TagsExternalDictionary.explanation: Path on server to local ispell executable, used to set $Lingua::Ispell::path  This dictionary is used as a "whitelist" of pre-allowed tags.

GoogleJackets.explanation: if ON, displays jacket covers from Google Books API

AutoSelfCheckID.explanation: Staff ID with circulation rights to be used for automatic web-based self-check. Only applies if AutoSelfCheckAllowed syspref is turned on.

OPACAmazonCoverImages.explanation: Display cover images on OPAC from Amazon Web Services

OpacMaintenance.explanation: If ON, enables maintenance warning in OPAC

BakerTaylorUsername.explanation: Baker & Taylor Username for Content Cafe (external content)

ReturnBeforeExpiry.explanation: If ON, checkout will be prevented if returndate is after patron card expiry

TagsInputOnDetail.explanation: Allow users to input tags from the detail page.

TemplateEncoding.explanation: Globally define the default character encoding

ClaimsReturnedValue.explanation: Lost value of Claims Returned,to be ignored by fines cron job

viewLabeledMARC.explanation: Allow display of labeled MARC view of bibiographic records

staffClientBaseURL.explanation: Specify the base URL of the staff client

WebBasedSelfCheck.explanation: If ON, enables the web-based self-check system

AllowReadingHistoryAnonymizing.explanation: Allows a borrower to optionally delete his or her reading history.

AllowOnShelfHolds.explanation: Allow hold requests to be placed on items that are not on loan

viewMARC.explanation: Allow display of MARC view of bibiographic records

AnonSuggestions.explanation: Set to anonymous borrowernumber to enable Anonymous suggestions

BakerTaylorBookstoreURL.explanation: URL template for "My Libary Bookstore" links, to which the "key" value is appended, and "https://" is prepended.  It should include your hostname and "Parent Number".  Make this variable empty to turn MLB links off.  Example: ocls.mylibrarybookstore.com/MLB/actions/searchHandler.do?nextPage=bookDetails&parentNum=10923&key=

OPACShowCheckoutName.explanation: Displays in the OPAC the name of patron who has checked out the material. WARNING: Most sites should leave this off. It is intended for corporate or special sites which need to track who has the item.

OPACShowCancelledHolds.explanation: The number in days that cancelled holds will display in the OPAC my hold history tab.  A value of 0 will display nothing.

DisableHoldsIssueOverrideUnlessAuthorise.explanation: If this preference is enabled,it will block staff ability to checkout items on hold,but includes a superlibrarian override.

itemBarcodeInputFilter.explanation: If set, allows specification of a item barcode input filter

OpacSuppression.explanation: Turn ON the OPAC Suppression feature, requires further setup, ask your system administrator for details

TagsShowOnList.explanation: Number of tags to display on search results list.  0 is off.

LinkLostItemsToPatron.explanation: If set, items marked lost will be listed in the patron Lost Items list

OPACXSLTResultsDisplay.explanation: Enable XSL stylesheet control over results page display on OPAC

AdvancedSearchTypes.explanation: Select which set of fields comprise the Type limit in the advanced search

minPasswordLength.explanation: Specify the minimum length of a patron/staff password

QueryRemoveStopwords.explanation: If ON, stopwords listed in the Administration area will be removed from queries

intranetstylesheet.explanation: Enter a complete URL to use an alternate layout stylesheet in Intranet

OPACAdvancedSearchTypes.explanation: Select which set of fields comprise the Type limit in the OPAC advanced search

RoutingSerials.explanation: If ON, serials routing is enabled

delimiter.explanation: Define the default separator character for exporting reports

HidePatronName.explanation: If this is switched on, patron's cardnumber will be shown instead of their name on the holds and catalog screens

AllowRenewalLimitOverride.explanation: if ON, allows renewal limits to be overridden on the circulation screen

intranetuserjs.explanation: Custom javascript for inclusion in Intranet

XSLTDetailsDisplay.explanation: Enable XSL stylesheet control over details page display on OPAC WARNING: MARC21 Only

SubscriptionHistory.explanation: Define the display preference for serials issue history in OPAC

MaxFine.explanation: Maximum fine a patron can have for a single late return

OPACFRBRizeEditions.explanation: If ON, the OPAC will query one or more ISBN web services for associated ISBNs and display an Editions tab on the details pages

AutoEmailOpacUser.explanation: Sends notification emails containing new account details to patrons - when account is created.

todaysIssuesDefaultSortOrder.explanation: Specify the sort order of Todays Issues on the circulation page

template.explanation: Define the preferred staff interface template

SearchMyLibraryFirst.explanation: If ON, OPAC searches return results limited by the user's library by default if they are logged in

OAI-PMH.explanation: if ON, OAI-PMH server is enabled

defaultSortField.explanation: Specify the default field used for sorting

uppercasesurnames.explanation: If ON, surnames are converted to upper case in patron entry form

SyndeticsAuthorNotes.explanation: Display Notes about the Author on OPAC from Syndetics

OPACFineNoRenewals.explanation: Fine limit above which user cannot renew books via OPAC

ApplyMaxFineWhenLostItemChargeRefunded.explanation: Use with RefundReturnedLostItem. If set, the maxfine on an item will be applied automatically when the lost item charges are refunded after a patron returns the item

AllowPatronsToCancelReadyHolds.explanation: If ON, OPAC users will have the ability to cancel waiting holds

RenewSerialAddsSuggestion.explanation: If ON, adds a new suggestion at serial subscription renewal

OPACSubscriptionDisplay.explanation: Specify how to display subscription information in the OPAC

EnableOverdueAccruedAmount.explanation: If ON,splits fines and charges into amount due and overdue accrued amount.  The latter amount can not be paid until the item is checked in.

NewItemsDefaultLocation.explanation: If set, all new items will have a location of the given Location Code ( Authorized Value type LOC )

numReturnedItemsToShow.explanation: Number of returned items to show on the check-in page

OPACXSLTDetailsDisplay.explanation: Enable XSL stylesheet control over details page display on OPAC

advancedMARCeditor.explanation: If ON, the MARC editor won't display field/subfield descriptions

DefaultOPACHoldType.explanation: If OPACUseHoldType is ON, this type will be used when a record is missing a 942$r subfield

ResetOpacInactivityTimeout.explanation: This will set an inactivity timer that will reset the OPAC to the main OPAC screen after the specified amount of time has passed since mouse movement was last detected. The value is 0 for disabled,or a positive integer for the number of seconds of inactivity before resetting the OPAC.

ShowOPACAvailabilityFacetSearch.explanation: If ON, show the availability search option in the OPAC Refine your search.

autoBarcode.explanation: Used to autogenerate a barcode: incremental will be of the form 1, 2, 3; annual of the form 2007-0001, 2007-0002; hbyymmincr of the form HB08010001 where HB=Home Branch

opacuserjs.explanation: Define custom javascript for inclusion in OPAC

AllowHoldDateInFuture.explanation: If set a date field is displayed on the Hold screen of the Staff Interface, allowing the hold date to be set in the future.

OpacRenewalAllowed.explanation: If ON, users can renew their issues directly from their OPAC account

finesCalendar.explanation: Specify whether to use the Calendar in calculating duedates and fines

DisplayMultiPlaceHold.explanation: If ON,displays the Place Hold button at the top of the search results list in staff and OPAC. Sites whose policies require tighter control over holds may want to turn this option off and limit users to placing holds one at a time.

SpineLabelFormat.explanation: This preference defines the format for the quick spine label printer. Just list the fields you would like to see in the order you would like to see them, surrounded by <>, for example <itemcallnumber>.

OpacPasswordChange.explanation: If ON, enables patron-initiated password change in OPAC (disable it when using LDAP auth)

globalDueDate.explanation: If set, allows a global static due date for all checkouts

IndependantBranches.explanation: If ON, increases security between libraries

OPACXSLTResultsAvailabilityDisplay.explanation: If ON, the availability section of the OPAC results will display when OPACXLSTResultsDisplay is also ON

intranetcolorstylesheet.explanation: Define the color stylesheet to use in the Staff Client

suggestion.explanation: If ON, enables patron suggestions feature in OPAC

AutoLocation.explanation: If ON, IP authentication is enabled, blocking access to the staff client from unauthorized IP addresses

HoldButtonIgnore.explanation: Display Ignore button when hold triggered.

BakerTaylorEnabled.explanation: Enable or disable all Baker & Taylor features.

useDaysMode.explanation: Choose the method for calculating due date: select Calendar to use the holidays module, and Days to ignore the holidays module

PatronDisplayReturn.explanation: If ON,allows items to be returned in the patron details display checkout list.

SIPItemDisplay.explanation: This sets the SIP display for the item field in the patron information response message

ReturnLog.explanation: If ON, enables the circulation (returns) log

RefundReturnedLostItem.explanation: If set, item charges will be refunded when a patron returns the item

acquisitions.explanation: Choose Normal, budget-based acquisitions, or Simple bibliographic-data acquisitions

item-level_itypes.explanation: If ON, enables Item-level Itemtype / Issuing Rules

BCCAllNotices.explanation: If set,sends a blind carbon of every email sent to the specified address

AmazonLocale.explanation: Use to set the Locale of your Amazon.com Web Services

z3950AuthorAuthFields.explanation: Define the MARC biblio fields for Personal Name Authorities to fill biblio.author

Babeltheque.explanation: Turn ON Babeltheque content  - See babeltheque.com to subscribe to this service

finesMode.explanation: Choose the fines mode, 'off', 'test' (emails admin report) or 'production' (accrue overdue fines).  Requires accruefines cronjob.

CircControl.explanation: Specify the agency that controls the circulation and fines policy

RandomizeHoldsQueueWeight.explanation: if ON, the holds queue in circulation will be randomized, either based on all location codes, or by the location codes specified in StaticHoldsQueueWeight

SyndeticsTOC.explanation: Display Table of Content information from Syndetics

opacreadinghistory.explanation: If ON, enables display of Patron Circulation History in OPAC

previousIssuesDefaultSortOrder.explanation: Specify the sort order of Previous Issues on the circulation page

EnhancedMessagingPreferences.explanation: If ON, allows patrons to select to receive additional messages about items due or nearly due.

HideItypeInOPAC.explanation: If ON, do not use/display item type in the OPAC

language.explanation: Set the default language in the staff client.

FillRequestsAtPickupLibrary.explanation: Fill hold requests at your local library if possible before sending an item to another branch to fill a hold request.

kohaspsuggest.explanation: Track search queries, turn on by defining host:dbname:user:pass

QueryAutoTruncate.explanation: If ON, query truncation is enabled by default

printcirculationslips.explanation: If ON, enable printing circulation receipts

ReservesNeedReturns.explanation: If ON, a hold placed on an item available in this library must be checked-in, otherwise, a hold on a specific item, that is in the library & available is considered available

LibraryThingForLibrariesEnabled.explanation: Enable or Disable Library Thing for Libraries Features

DefaultClassificationSource.explanation: Default classification scheme used by the collection. E.g., Dewey, LCC, etc.

TalkingTechEnabled.explanation: Turn on Talking Tech phone messaging

WarnOnlyOnMaxFine.explanation: If UseGranularMaxFines and WarnOnlyOnMaxFine are both enabled,fine warnings will only occur when the fine for an item hits the max_fine attribute set in issuingrules.

OpacMainUserBlock.explanation: A user-defined block of HTML  in the main content area of the opac main page

DisplayOthernames.explanation: Ability to turn the othernames field on/off in patron screen

BatchMemberDeletePaidDebtCollections.explanation: If on,the batch delete will refuse to delete members with unpaid fines before being put in debt collections.

libraryAddress.explanation: The address to use for printing receipts, overdues, etc. if different than physical address

IssuingInProcess.explanation: If ON, disables fines if the patron is issuing item that accumulate debt

OPACDefaultItemSort.explanation: Specify record holdings sort by what field in the OPAC.  Default is 'itemtype'.

TagsEnabled.explanation: Enables or disables all tagging features.  This is the main switch for tags.

ThingISBN.explanation: Use with FRBRizeEditions. If ON, Koha will use the ThingISBN web service in the Editions tab on the detail pages.

IntranetmainUserblock.explanation: Add a block of HTML that will display on the intranet home page

OPACDisplayRequestPriority.explanation: Show patrons the priority level on holds in the OPAC

EditAllLibraries.explanation: If set, all libraries have privileges to edit all items; if OFF, libraries may only edit items owned by their own library

StaticHoldsQueueWeight.explanation: Specify a list of library location codes separated by commas -- the list of codes will be traversed and weighted with first values given higher weight for holds fulfillment -- alternatively, if RandomizeHoldsQueueWeight is set, the list will be randomly selective

BiblioDefaultView.explanation: Choose the default detail view in the catalog; choose between normal, marc or isbd

OPACdefaultSortField.explanation: Specify the default field used for sorting

ReservesMaxPickUpDelay.explanation: Define the Maximum delay to pick up an item on hold

CataloguingLog.explanation: If ON, log edit/create/delete actions on bibliographic data. WARNING: this feature is very resource consuming.

autoMemberNum.explanation: If ON, patron number is auto-calculated

OAI-PMH:Subset.explanation: Restrict answer to matching raws of the biblioitems table EXPERIMENTAL

viewISBD.explanation: Allow display of ISBD view of bibiographic records

AllowAllMessageDeletion.explanation: Allow any Library to delete any message

UseGranularMaxFines.explanation: If enabled,this allows you to define the max for an item by a combination of itemtype & patroncategory.

authoritysep.explanation: Used to separate a list of authorities in a display. Usually --

OwedNotificationValue.explanation: Amount owed to receive a notification.  To work,EnableOwedNotification syspref will need to be turned ON.

BatchMemberDeleteFineThreshhold.explanation: Any borrower with an amount of fines greater than this value cannot be deleted via batch borrower deleting.

StaffShowCancelledHolds.explanation: The number in days that cancelled holds will display in the staff hold history tab.  A value of 0 will display nothing.

EnableOwedNotification.explanation: If ON,allows a notification to be sent on total amount owed.  OwedNotificationValue syspref will need to be set to the desired amount.

TagsModeration.explanation: Require tags from patrons to be approved before becoming visible.

opacsmallimage.explanation: Enter a complete URL to an image to replace the default Koha logo

DisplayOPACiconsXSLT.explanation: If ON, displays the format, audience, type icons in XSLT MARC21 results and display pages.

UseReceiptTemplates.explanation: Enable the use of the Receipt Templates system.

QueryFuzzy.explanation: If ON, enables fuzzy option for searches

UseGranularMaxHolds.explanation: If enabled,this allows you to define the maximum number of holds by a combination of itemtype & patroncategory.

SyndeticsClientCode.explanation: Client Code for using Syndetics Solutions content

RequestOnOpac.explanation: If ON, globally enables patron holds on OPAC

OPACItemsResultsDisplay.explanation: statuses : show only the status of items in result list. itemdisplay : show full location of items (branch+location+callnumber) as in staff interface

ReturnToShelvingCart.explanation: If set, when any item is 'checked in', it's location code will be changed to CART.

opacuserlogin.explanation: Enable or disable display of user login features

PrintNoticesMaxLines.explanation: If greater than 0, sets the maximum number of lines an overdue notice will print. If the number of items is greater than this number, the notice will end with a warning asking the borrower to check their online account for a full list of overdue items.
